name: Predestination - A turn-based space 4X strategy game
blurb: Kickstart the Northern Ireland games industry by backing Brain and Nerd's indie 4X space strategy game Predestination.

rewards.reward: --------- BE A SUPPORTER ---------\r\nReceive free digital concept art books, wallpapers and soundtrack downloads as development progresses (all DRM-free, use them how you want). You'll also get supporter rank in our community forum, where you can discuss ideas for the game.
------ PRE-ORDER THE GAME ------\r\nGet a DRM-free copy of the game with exclusive kickstarter-only content.

PRE-ORDER + FREE DLC FOR LIFE\r\nSupport our efforts to beat piracy without resorting to DRM. Get a DRM-free copy of the game with exclusive kickstarter-only content, free DLC for life, and a free copy of every expansion pack we release. We plan to release at least $25 of DLC and at least one expansion pack.

PRE-ORDER + BETA + GIFT COPY\r\nEverything in the $25 reward, plus a bonus gift copy of the game to send to a friend. You'll also get guaranteed access to every beta version and early beta access to the ship design and level design tools.
-- NAME A STAR + BETA + GIFT --\r\nEverything in the $40 reward, plus you can name a star system in the game and have your real name appear in a ship crew list! Only 100 available.

*NEW*- DESIGN YOUR OWN MISSILE -\r\nEverything in the $40 reward, plus we'll work with you to design and name a type of planet-to-planet missile (See update #11) based on your own ideas. You could make the missile target specific buildings, destroy certain resources, modify terrain or have any other effect you can think of. You'll also get a mention in the game credits for your design contribution!

------- COLLECTOR'S EDITION ------- A limited edition physical DVD of the finished game with bonus extra content, beta access and free DLC for life. We'll also send you a pack full of goodies: Exclusive posters, a physical soundtrack CD,  and other things that will never be released again after this Kickstarter campaign. Also included are signed personal thank-you post cards from each of the team members, and a free digital gift copy to give to a friend.

- COMMANDER DELUXE EDITION -\r\nEverything in the $100 collector's edition reward, plus you will get to design a military commander or colony leader in the game. You can name your commander, pick a portrait for him and select stats or decide what type of commander he'll be. You'll also get a special mention in the game credits for your design contribution. Only 50 available.

- CONCEPT ART SUPER EDITION -\r\nYou'll get an original piece of concept art from the game's development, signed by the artist. In the case of digital concept art, you'll receive professional prints of the artwork that are guaranteed to be one of a kind. Includes a special thank-you card from the team! *** Includes everything in the $100 collector's edition reward.

LEVEL DESIGNER PREMIUM EDITION\r\nWe'll work with you to design your own singleplayer scenario, which will appear in the final game for everyone to play. You will appear in the game credits as a level designer. *** Includes everything in the $100 collector's edition reward.

DESIGN YOUR OWN RACE + LEVEL DESIGN + FREE GAMES FOR LIFE!\r\nWe'll work with you to design your own race, which will be one of the default races in Predestination! Character artist Connor Murphy will paint artwork based on your directions, and you'll get to decide on stats and a whole background story for the race! We'll also work with you to produce a singleplayer level that introduces your race and its story. (Your race must fit within the Predestination lore and style, and can't use any copyrighted designs.) You'll get a free copy of every game we ever make, and your name will be in the credits of every game we make. *** Also includes a $100 collector's edition

--- CORPORATE ENDORSEMENT ---\r\nThis reward is intended for any development studios or companies that want to support our new studio and the emerging Northern Ireland games industry. This reward level comes with a permanent advertisement in the intro to the game with your company's logo and a message saying that the game was made possible with a generous donation from your company. *** You'll also get a copy of the game for every employee to show them what they're helping to sponsor (max 200 copies)
